eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\{Q_r^a, Q_s^b\} & = & 2 \delta^{a,b}~,
\, L_{r+s} +i \eps^{ab}_{~~c} (r-s) T^c_{r+s}~, \label{uno} \\
\[L_m, L_n\] & = & (m-n) L_{m+n}~, \label{dos} \\
\[T^a_0, T^b_0\] & = & i \eps^{ab}_{~~c} \, T^c_0~, \label{tres} \\
\[L_m, Q_r^a \] & = & \left(\half m - r\right) Q^a_{m+r}~, \label{cuatro}\\
\[T^a_0, Q_r^b\] & = & i \eps^{ab}_{~~c} Q_r^c~, \label{cinco}
\
